articles.title: Australian golf legend Greg Norman is diagnosed with coronavirus on Christmas Day - Daily Mail
articles.description: Australian golf legend Greg Norman has been diagnosed with coronavirus just days after receiving a negative test result and exhibiting 'mild symptoms'.
articles.content:
Australian golf legend Greg Norman has been diagnosed with coronavirus just days after receiving a negative test result and exhibiting 'mild symptoms'.
